haReport:
This mission was flown by:
Ltn Patrik Schorner, Ltn Patrik Schorner
Fw Christian Welser, Fw Christian Welser
Fw Meinhard Frohlich, Fw Meinhard Frohlich
Fw Nikolaus Fechter, Fw Nikolaus Fechter

 The mission was flown from Pukov aerodrome.

Successes include the following: 
On 02/04/1916 near Factory.
A Sikorsky S-16 of 4th AOI was brought down by Meinhard Frohlich of FA 15.
Gavrilovich Tseydlits was killed in action.
Meinhard Frohlich and Wenzel Scheiner were  flying a Roland C.IIa.

On 02/04/1916 near Factory.
A F.E.2b of 2nd KAO was brought down by Rudiger Bretschneider of FA 15.
Cpt Sergei Taushev was killed in action.
Pk Nicolai Panin was killed in action.
Rudiger Bretschneider was  flying a Roland C.IIa.

On 02/04/1916 near Factory.
A Sikorsky S-16 of 4th AOI was brought down by Patrik Schorner of FA 15.
PavIpv Melnikov was killed in action.
Patrik Schorner and Rudiger Hoelscher were  flying a Roland C.IIa.

On 02/04/1916 near Factory.
A F.E.2b of 2nd KAO was brought down by Heinrich Haeberli of FA 15.
Pk Tolya Chaly was killed in action.
Pk Akim Krutov was killed in action.
Heinrich Haeberli was  flying a Roland C.IIa.

On 02/04/1916 near Factory.
A Sikorsky S-16 of 4th AOI was brought down by Nikolaus Fechter of FA 15.
Tamryn Lazarev was not injured.
Nikolaus Fechter and Sepp Homberg were  flying a Roland C.IIa.

On 02/04/1916 near Factory.
A Sikorsky S-16 of 7th AOI was brought down by Wolfram Tendler of FA 15.
DPk Sacha Dorofeyev was killed in action.
Wolfram Tendler was  flying a Roland C.IIa.

On 02/04/1916 near Factory.
A F.E.2b of 8th KAO was brought down by Bernd Treich of FA 15.
Pk Yurik Slavsky was killed in action.
Lt Fjodor Golovanov was killed in action.
Bernd Treich was  flying a Roland C.IIa.
narrative: My first victory as a pilot!  I shoot down a Russian Sikorsky.  They are old planes but very maneuverable.  Thevictory comes in a swirling melee.  The unit brings down three in total.
